mapper.insert: insert into Pet_Owner(Pet_Owner_no,Pet_Owner_tel, Pet_Owner_name, Pet_Owner_id, Pet_Owner_password, Pet_Owner_address) values(Pet_Owner_no_seq.nextval, #{petOwnerTel}, #{petOwnerName}, #{petOwnerId}, #{petOwnerPassword}, #{petOwnerAddress})
insert into Pet(Pet_name, Pet_Owner_tel, Pet_birthday, Pet_gender, Pet_note, Animal_kind_name) values(#{petName}, '01012341234', #{petBirthday}, #{petGender}, #{petNote}, #{animalKindName})
mapper.select: select po.Pet_Owner_no, po.Pet_Owner_id, po.Pet_Owner_name, po.Pet_Owner_tel, po.Pet_Owner_address from Pet_Owner po, Pet p where po.Pet_Owner_id = #{petOwnerId} and po.Pet_Owner_password =#{petOwnerPassword} and po.Pet_Owner_no = p.Pet_Owner_no
select p.Pet_name, p.Pet_birthday, p.Pet_gender, p.Pet_note, p.Pet_Animal_kind_name from Pet_Owner po, Pet p where po.Pet_Owner_no_seq = p.Pet_Owner_no_seq and po.Pet_Owner_id = #{petOwnerId}

select tr.Treatment_Record_no, tr.Treatment_hours, tr.Treatment_content, p.Pet_name, tr.Pet_weight, p.Pet_gender, tr.Disease_name from Treatment_Record tr , Pet p , Pet_Owner po where po.Pet_Owner_id=#{petOwnerId} and p.Pet_name = #{petName} and p.Pet_Owner_no = tr.Pet_Owner_no and p.Pet_name = tr.Pet_name
